articles.author: Zack Sharf
articles.title: American Eagle Defends Sydney Sweeney Ads Amid Liberal Backlash - Variety
articles.description: American Eagle is standing by its controversial ad campaign with Sydney Sweeney, which boasts the tagline: "Sydney Sweeney Has Great Jeans."
articles.content: American Eagle is standing by its controversial ad campaign featuring Sydney Sweeney, which includes various commercials with the tagline: “Sydney Sweeney Has Great Jeans.” The campaign creates a pun… [+2386 chars]
